channel.title: Services on Level Up Chess Coaching
channel.description: Recent content in Services on Level Up Chess Coaching

item.title: 1-on-1 In Person Coaching
item.description: Personalized 1-1 session with in depth game analysis review for beginners all the way to advanced gameplay theory I offer chess instruction for all levels of chess players. All instruction is available online in one-on-one sessions. Each lesson is a minimum of one hour and is typically once a week for four weeks. I offer chess tournament preparation including opening repetoire and game assessments. Some advanced students also opt for the sparring partner package.

item.title: 1-on-1 Online Coaching
item.description: Personalized 1-1 session with in depth game analysis review for beginners all the way to advanced gameplay theory I offer chess instruction for all levels of chess players.
